Pre-Game Insights: The Memphis Grizzlies are 22-10 and first in the Southwest Division.
The Oklahoma City Thunder are 24-5 and lead the Northwest division by 8 games.
Ja Morant, the leading scorer for the Grizzlies, is doubtful for Sunday's game due to a shoulder injury.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, the leading scorer for the Thunder, scored a career-high 45 points in their last game.
Others: The Oklahoma City Thunder will be completing a back-to-back on Sunday.
The Grizzlies have won two straight and four of the last five games.
The Thunder have covered the number in eight of their last 10 games.
The OVER has cashed in 6 of the Grizzlies’ last 8 games on the road.
The UNDER has cashed in 5 of the Thunder’s last 7 games.
